question:
[Jamie] and her son, [Oscar], went to the park to fly a kite. They had fun doing it all day. [Daniel] was so proud of his son, [Richard]. he received a great scholarship to college. [Faye] went shoe shopping with her sister [Jamie]. [Joel] likes to watch baseball with his brother. His name is [Richard]. [Jamie] asked her husband [Daniel] if he could chop up some vegetables for dinner. [Richard] was walked down to the bus stop by his sister [Nola] because his mother [Jamie] told her to to do so. [Nola] and her brother [Oscar] enlisted in the army
Question: How is [Faye] related to [Joel]?
